datatypeId.description: Identifier for the data type used to calculate the association score (e.g. genetic_association)

datasourceId.description: Identifier for the data source used to calculate the association score. (e.g. chembl)

diseaseId.description: Identifier for the disease in the association.

targetId.description: Identifier for the target in the association.

score.description: Association score calculated independently for each data source without ontology propagation of evidence

evidenceCount.description: Number of evidence items supporting the association.

diseaseId.description: Identifier for the disease in the association.

targetId.description: Identifier for the target in the association.

datatypeId.description: Identifier for the data type used to calculate the association score.

score.description: Association score calculated independently for each data type without additional ontology propagation.

evidenceCount.description: Number of evidence items supporting the association.

diseaseId.description: Identifier for the disease in the association.

targetId.description: Identifier for the target in the association.

score.description: Association score calculated across all data sources without ontology propagation of evidence

evidenceCount.description: Number of evidence items supporting the association.

datatypeId.description: Identifier for the data type used to calculate the association score (e.g. genetic_association)

datasourceId.description: Identifier for the data source used to calculate the association score. (e.g. chembl)

diseaseId.description: Identifier for the disease in the association.

targetId.description: Identifier for the target in the association.

score.description: Association score calculated independently for each data source considering ontology propagation of evidence

evidenceCount.description: Number of evidence items supporting the association.

diseaseId.description: Identifier for the disease in the association.

targetId.description: Identifier for the target in the association.

datatypeId.description: Identifier for the data type used to calculate the association score.

score.description: Association score calculated independently for each data type, considering ontology propagation of evidence

evidenceCount.description: Number of evidence items supporting the association.

diseaseId.description: Identifier for the disease in the association.

targetId.description: Identifier for the target in the association.

score.description: Association score calculated across all data sources considering ontology propagation of evidence

evidenceCount.description: Number of evidence items supporting the association.

id.description: Ensembl human gene identifier for the expressed gene [bioregistry:ensembl]

tissues.description: Array of structs containing expression data relevant to a particular gene

efo_code.description: Ontology ID of the biosample the expression data is from [bioregistry:uberon]

label.description: Name of the biosample the expression data is from

organs.description: List of organs that the biosample can be found in

anatomical_systems.description: List of anatomical systems that the biosample can be found in

rna.description: Struct containing relevant RNA expression values for a particular biosample and gene combination

level.description: Level of RNA expression normalised to 0-5 or -1 if absent

protein.description: Struct containing relevant protein expression values for a particular biosample and gene combination

level.description: Level of protein expression normalised to 0-5 or -1 if absent

cell_type.description: List of cell types were protein levels were measured

synonyms.description: List of synonymous names for the term

parents.description: Direct parent biosample IDs in the ontology

ancestors.description: List of ancestor biosample IDs in the ontology

children.description: Direct child biosample IDs in the ontology

descendants.description: List of descendant biosample IDs in the ontology

leftStudyLocusId.description: Study-locus identifier for left-side overlapping signal

rightStudyLocusId.description: Study-locus identifier for right-side overlapping signal

rightStudyType.description: Type of the right-side study (e.g., gwas, eqtl).

numberColocalisingVariants.description: Number of variants intersecting between two overlapping study-loci

h0.description: Posterior probability that neither trait is associated with the region (H0).

h1.description: Posterior probability that only the left study trait is associated (H1).

h2.description: Posterior probability that only the right study trait is associated (H2).

h3.description: Posterior probability that both traits are associated, but with different causal variants (H3).

h4.description: Posterior probability that both traits are associated and share a causal variant (H4).

colocalisationMethod.description: Method used to estimate colocalisation (e.g., coloc).

betaRatioSignAverage.description: Average sign of the beta ratio between colocalised variants.

leftStudyLocusId.description: Study-locus identifier for left-side overlapping signal

rightStudyLocusId.description: Study-locus identifier for right-side overlapping signal

rightStudyType.description: Type of the right-side study (e.g., gwas, eqtl).

numberColocalisingVariants.description: Number of variants intersecting between two overlapping study-loci

clpp.description: Colocalisation posterior probability (CLPP) score estimating the probability of shared causal variants.

colocalisationMethod.description: Method used to estimate colocalisation (e.g., eCAVIAR).

betaRatioSignAverage.description: Average sign of the beta ratio between colocalised variants.

studyLocusId.description: Study-locus identifier for the credible set.

studyId.description: Identifier for the study which the credible set is derived.

variantId.description: The lead variant for the credible set, by posterior probability.

chromosome.description: Chromosome which the credible set is located.

position.description: Position of the lead variant for the credible set (GRCh38).

region.description: Start and end positions of the region used for fine-mapping.

beta.description: Beta coefficient of the lead variant.

zScore.description: Z-score of the lead variant from the GWAS.

pValueMantissa.description: Mantissa value of the lead variant P-value.

pValueExponent.description: Exponent value of the lead variant P-value.

effectAlleleFrequencyFromSource.description: Allele frequency of the lead variant from the GWAS.

standardError.description: Standard error of the lead variant.

qualityControls.description: Quality control flags for this credible set.

finemappingMethod.description: Method used for fine-mapping of credible set.

credibleSetIndex.description: Integer label for the order of credible sets from study-region.

credibleSetlog10BF.description: Log10 Bayes factor for the entire credible set.

purityMeanR2.description: Mean R-squared linkage disequilibrium for variants in the credible set.

purityMinR2.description: Minimum R-squared linkage disequilibrium for variants in the credible set.

locusStart.description: Start position of the region that was fine-mapped for this credible set.

locusEnd.description: End position of the regino that was fine-mapped for this credible set.

sampleSize.description: Sample size of the study which this credible set is derived.

ldSet.description: Array of structs which denote the variants in LD with the credible set lead variant.

tagVariantId.description: The variant ID for tag variants in LD with the credible set lead variant.

r2Overall.description: The R-squared value for the tag variants with the credible set lead variant.

locus.description: Array of structs which denote the variants within the credible set.

is95CredibleSet.description: Boolean for if the variant is part of the 95% credible set.

is99CredibleSet.description: Boolean for if the variant is part of the 99% credible set.

logBF.description: Log (natural) Bayes factor for the variant from fine-mapping.

posteriorProbability.description: Posterior inclusion probability for the variant within this credible set.

variantId.description: Variant ID for this variant in the credible set.

pValueMantissa.description: Mantissa of the P-value for this variant in the credible set.

pValueExponent.description: Exponent of the P-value for this variant in the credible set.

beta.description: Beta coefficient of this variant in the credible set.

standardError.description: Standard error of this variant in the credible set.

r2Overall.description: R-squared (LD) between this credible set variant and the lead variant.

confidence.description: Description of how this credible set was derived in terms of data and fine-mapping method.

studyType.description: Descriptor for whether the credible set is derived from GWAS or molecular QTL.

isTransQtl.description: Boolean for whether this credible set is a trans-pQTL or not.

id.description: Open Targets disease identifier

ancestors.description: List of all ancestral disease terms

therapeuticAreas.description: List of major therapeutic areas the disease belongs to

ontology.description: Description of the disease's place in the ontology tree

isTherapeuticArea.description: Boolean column indicating if a disease is root of the ontology tree, a therapeutic area

leaf.description: Boolean column indicating if a disease is a leaf entity in the ontology tree

name.description: Lable of the term in the ontology

phenotype.description: The phenotype linked to the disease.

evidence.description: A container for all evidence-related attributes supporting the disease-phenotype association.

aspect.description: The category of biological information being provided (e.g., clinical, genetic, etc.).

bioCuration.description: Indicates whether the evidence has been manually curated.

diseaseFromSourceId.description: Unique identifier for the disease from the original source.

diseaseFromSource.description: The disease name as recorded in the original source.

evidenceType.description: The type of evidence supporting the disease-phenotype relationship.

frequency.description: The observed frequency of the phenotype in individuals with the disease.

modifiers.description: Additional characteristics or modifiers related to the phenotype.

onset.description: Age or stage of disease onset for the phenotype.

qualifier.description: Additional qualifiers specifying the phenotype-disease relationship.

qualifierNot.description: Specifies if a phenotype is not observed in a given disease.

references.description: References or citations supporting the evidence. [bioregistry:pubmed]

sex.description: Indicates if the association is specific to a biological sex.

resource.description: The data source from which the evidence was obtained.

id.description: Open Targets molecule identifier

indications.description: List of approved and investigational indications for which a drug can be used

references.description: List of sources supporting the drug-indication relationship

ids.description: List of identification codes for the reference sources

maxPhaseForIndication.description: Highest clinical trial phase reached for a specific indication

approvedIndications.description: List of disease identifiers for a drug approved indications

indicationCount.description: Total number of indications for a drug

chemblIds.description: List of Open Targets molecule identifiers

toxicityClass.description: Classification of toxicity type associated with the drug

country.description: Country where the warning was issued

description.description: Description of the drug adverse effect

id.description: Internal identifier for the drug warning record

references.description: List of sources supporting the warning information

ref_id.description: List of identifiers for the reference sources

ref_type.description: List of bodies reporting the warning

ref_url.description: List of web addresses referencing the information

warningType.description: Classification of action taken (drug is withdrawn or has a black box warning)

year.description: Year when the warning was issues

efo_id_for_warning_class.description: Disease identifier categorising the type of warning

id.description: Open Targets molecule identifier

canonicalSmiles.description: Standardized chemical structure representation using SMILES notation

inchiKey.description: Chemical identifier generated from the molecular structure

drugType.description: Classification of the molecule's therapeutic category or chemical class (e.g. Antibody)

blackBoxWarning.description: Flag indicating whether the drug has safety warnings

name.description: Generic name of the drug molecule

yearOfFirstApproval.description: Year when the drug received regulatory approval

maximumClinicalTrialPhase.description: Highest clinical trial phase reached by the drug

parentId.description: Open Targets molecule identifier of the parent molecule for derivative compounds

hasBeenWithdrawn.description: Flag indicating whether the drug was removed from market

isApproved.description: Flag indicating whether the drug has received regulatory approval

tradeNames.description: List of brand names for the drug

synonyms.description: List of alternative names for the drug

crossReferences.description: List of identifiers in other databases

ids.description: List of identifiers in other databases

childChemblIds.description: List of Open Targets molecule identifiers of derivative compounds

linkedDiseases.description: List of Open Targets disease identifiers of conditions associated with the drug

rows.description: List of Open Targets disease identifiers of conditions associated with the drug

count.description: Total number of Open Targets disease identifiers associated with the drug

linkedTargets.description: List of Open Targets target identifiers associated with the drug

rows.description: List of Open Targets target identifiers associated with the drug

count.description: Total number of Open Targets target identifiers associated with the drug

description.description: Summary of the drug's clinical development

datatypeId.description: Classification of the type of pharmacogenomic data (e.g. clinical_annotation)

directionality.description: Indicates in which direction the genetic variant increases or decreases drug response

evidenceLevel.description: Strength of the scientific support for the variant/drug response

genotypeAnnotationText.description: Explanation of the genotype's clinical significance

genotypeId.description: Identifier for the specific genetic variant combination (e.g. 1_1500_A_A,T)

haplotypeFromSourceId.description: Haplotype ID in the PharmKGB dataset

haplotypeId.description: Combination of genetic variants that constitute a particular allele of a gene (e.g. CYP2C9*3)

literature.description: PubMed identifier (PMID) of the literature entry

pgxCategory.description: Classification of the drug response type (e.g. Toxicity)

phenotypeFromSourceId.description: Open Targets disease identifier result of mapping phenotypeText

phenotypeText.description: Drug response influenced by the variation

studyId.description: Clinical Annotation ID in the PharmKGB dataset

targetFromSourceId.description: Open Targets target identifier as provided by the data source

variantFunctionalConsequenceId.description: The sequence ontology identifier of the consequence of the variant based on Ensembl VEP in the context of the transcript [bioregistry:so]

variantId.description: The unique identifier for the variant following schema: {chromosome}-{position}-{referenceAllele}-{alternateAllele}

isDirectTarget.description: Flag indicating whether the target overlapping the variation is directly targeted by the drug

drugs.description: List of drugs affected by this genetic variation

drugFromSource.description: List of drug identifiers from the original data source

drugId.description: List of Open Targets drug identifiers

studyId.description: Unique identifier of the GWAS or molQTL study.

geneId.description: Ensembl identifier of the gene representing a specific gene whose molecular is being analysed in molQTL study. [bioregistry:ensembl]

projectId.description: Identifier of the source project collection that the study information is derived from.

studyType.description: Field specifying if study contains phenotype/disease or molecular genetic associations.

traitFromSource.description: Molecular or phenotypic trait, derived from source, analysed in the study.

traitFromSourceMappedIds.description: Phenotypic trait ids that map to the analysed trait reported by study.

biosampleFromSourceId.description: Identifier of the referenced biological material.

pubmedId.description: PubMed identifier of the publication hat references the study. [bioregistry:pubmed]

publicationTitle.description: Title of the publication that references the study.

publicationFirstAuthor.description: Last name and initials of the author of the publication that references the study.

publicationDate.description: Date of the publication that references study.

publicationJournal.description: Abbreviated journal name where the publication referencing study was published.

backgroundTraitFromSourceMappedIds.description: Any background trait(s) shared by all individuals in the study.

nCases.description: The number of cases in this broad ancestry group.

nControls.description: The number of controls in this broad ancestry group.

nSamples.description: The number of samples tested in GWAS analysis

cohorts.description: List of cohort(s) represented in the discovery sample.

ldPopulationStructure.description: Collection of populations referenced by the study.

relativeSampleSize.description: Fraction of the total sample represented by the population.

discoverySamples.description: Collection of ancestries reported by the study discovery phase.

replicationSamples.description: Collection of ancestries reported by the study replication phase.

analysisFlags.description: Collection of flags indicating the type of the analysis conducted in the association study.

summarystatsLocation.description: Path to the source study summary statistics (if exists at the source)

hasSumstats.description: Indication whether the summary statistics exist in the source.

diseaseIds.description: Disease identifier associated with a studied trait.

backgroundDiseaseIds.description: Any background disease(s) shared by all individuals in the study.

biosampleId.description: Biosample identifier that maps to the biosample reported by study. [bioregistry:uberon]

id.description: Unique identifier for the disease in the Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO)

dbXRefs.description: Database cross-references for the HPO disease

parents.description: List of parent terms for the disease

obsoleteTerms.description: List of obsolete terms for the disease

phase.description: Clinical development stage of the drug

status.description: Clinical trial status for the drug/indication pair

urls.description: List of web addresses that support the drug/indication pair

niceName.description: List of human readable names for the reference source

url.description: List of web addresses that support the drug/indication pair

ancestors.description: List of parent disease terms of the condition being treated

label.description: Disease label for the condition being treated

approvedSymbol.description: Approved gene symbol of the target modulated by the drug

approvedName.description: Approved full name of the gene or gene product modulated by the drug

targetClass.description: Classification category of the drug's biological target (e.g. Enzyme)

prefName.description: Commonly used name for the drug

tradeNames.description: List of brand names for the drug

synonyms.description: List of alternative names to refer to the drug

drugType.description: Classification of the modality of the drug (e.g. Small molecule)

targetName.description: Full name of the gene or gene product modulated by the drug, as referred by ChEMBL

pmid.description: PubMed identifier (PMID) of the literature entry

pmcid.description: PubMed Central ID (PMCID) of the literature entry

date.description: Date of publication in YYYY-MM-DD format

keywordId.description: Unique identifier for the keyword associated with the literature entry

relevance.description: Relevance score of the keyword within the literature entry

keywordType.description: Type of keyword identified in the literature entry. Values: DS: disease/syndrome, GP: gene/protein, CD: chemical/drug

category.description: Category of the entity match in the literature. Either target, drug or disease

word.description: Normalised identifier of the matched entity

norm.description: Normalized form of the extracted word

vector.description: Vector representation of the word based on word embedding

studyLocusId.description: Study-locus identifier for the credible set

score.description: Locus-to-gene score prediction for the given studyLocusId-geneId pair

features.description: List of Locus to Gene feature values

name.description: Name of the feature used in locus to gene prediction

sourceDatabase.description: Source database reporting the molecular interaction.

targetA.description: Open Targets target identifier of the first molecule (target A) in the interaction. [bioregistry:ensembl]

intA.description: Identifier for target A in source

intABiologicalRole.description: Biological role of target A in the interaction.

targetB.description: Open Targets target identifier of the second molecule (target B) in the interaction. [bioregistry:ensembl]

intB.description: Identifier for target B in source

intBBiologicalRole.description: Biological role of target B in the interaction

mnemonic.description: Short mnemonic name of the species associated with target A

scientific_name.description: Scientific name of the species associated with target A

taxon_id.description: NCBI taxon ID of the species associated with target A

scientific_name.description: Scientific name of the species associated with target B

taxon_id.description: NCBI taxon ID of the species associated with target B

count.description: Number of interaction occurrences reported in the source databases.

scoring.description: Scoring or confidence value assigned to the interaction.

participantDetectionMethodA.description: Detection method used to identify participant A in the interaction

miIdentifier.description: Molecular Interactions (MI) identifier for participant As detection method [bioregistry:mi]

shortName.description: Short name of participant As detection method

participantDetectionMethodB.description: Detection method used to identify participant B in the interaction

shortName.description: Short name of participant Bs detection method

hostOrganismTaxId.description: NCBI taxon ID of the host organism

targetB.description: Open Targets target identifier of the second molecule (target B) in the interaction [bioregistry:ensembl]

evidenceScore.description: Score indicating the confidence or strength of the interaction evidence

expansionMethodShortName.description: Short name of the method used to expand the interaction dataset

hostOrganismScientificName.description: Scientific name of the host organism in which the interaction was observed

intBBiologicalRole.description: Biological role of target B in the interaction

interactionResources.description: Databases providing evidence for the interaction

databaseVersion.description: Version of the source database providing interaction evidence

sourceDatabase.description: Name of the source database reporting the interaction evidence

interactionDetectionMethodShortName.description: Short name of the method used to detect the interaction

intA.description: Identifier for target A in source

intBSource.description: Source where interactor B is identified

interactionTypeMiIdentifier.description: Molecular Interactions (MI) identifier for the type of interaction [bioregistry:mi]

mnemonic.description: Short mnemonic name of the species associated with target B

scientificName.description: Scientific name of the species associated with target B

taxonId.description: NCBI taxon ID of the species associated with target B

expansionMethodMiIdentifier.description: Molecular Interactions (MI) identifier for the expansion method used [bioregistry:mi]

interactionTypeShortName.description: Short name of the interaction type

interactionIdentifier.description: Unique identifier for the interaction evidence entry at the source

hostOrganismTissue.description: Tissue of the host organism, where the interaction was identified

xrefs.description: Cross-references to external databases for the host organism's tissue

scientificName.description: Scientific name of the species associated with target A

intB.description: Identifier for target B in source

pubmedId.description: PubMed ID of the publication supporting the interaction evidence

intABiologicalRole.description: Biological role of target A in the interaction

interactionScore.description: Score assigned to the interaction based on supporting evidence

targetA.description: Open Targets target identifier of the second molecule (target A) in the interaction [bioregistry:ensembl]

interactionDetectionMethodMiIdentifier.description: Molecular Interactions (MI) identifier for the interaction detection method [bioregistry:mi]

biologicalModels.description: Container for all biological model-related attributes.

allelicComposition.description: The specific allelic composition of the mouse model.

geneticBackground.description: The genetic background strain of the mouse model.

id.description: Unique identifier for the biological model. [bioregistry:mgi]

literature.description: References related to the mouse model. [bioregistry:pubmed]

id.description: Unique identifier for the phenotype class. [bioregistry:mp]

label.description: Descriptive label for the phenotype class.

modelPhenotypeId.description: Identifier for the specific phenotype observed in the model. [bioregistry:mp]

modelPhenotypeLabel.description: Human-readable label describing the observed phenotype.

targetFromSourceId.description: Identifier for the human target as provided by the data source.

targetInModel.description: Name of the target gene as represented in the mouse model.

targetInModelEnsemblId.description: Ensembl identifier for the target gene in the mouse model. [bioregistry:ensembl]

targetInModelMgiId.description: MGI (Mouse Genome Informatics) identifier for the target gene in the model. [bioregistry:mgi]

chembl_id.description: Unique identifier for the drug or clinical candidate

event.description: Reported adverse drug reaction associated with the drug.

count.description: Number of occurrences of the adverse event in the dataset.

llr.description: Log-likelihood ratio (LLR) measuring the strength of the association between the drug and the adverse event.

critval.description: Critical value used to determine statistical significance of the association.

meddraCode.description: Medical Dictionary for Regulatory Activities (MedDRA) code for the adverse drug reaction.

targetId.description: Unique identifier for the drug target

event.description: Reported adverse drug reactions associated with drugs targeting the molecule.

count.description: Number of occurrences of adverse events in the dataset when looking at all drugs targeting the same molecule.

llr.description: Log-likelihood ratio (LLR) measuring the strength of the association between all drugs targeting the same molecule and the adverse event.

critval.description: Critical value used to determine statistical significance of the association.

meddraCode.description: Medical Dictionary for Regulatory Activities (MedDRA) code for the adverse drug reaction.

id.description: Sequence ontology term identifier [bioregistry:so]
Unique identifier for the target [bioregistry:ensembl]

approvedSymbol.description: Approved gene symbol of the target

biotype.description: Biotype classification of the target gene, indicating if the gene is protein coding

transcriptIds.description: List of Ensembl transcript identifiers associated with the target

canonicalTranscript.description: The Ensembl canonical transcript of the target gene

id.description: The Ensembl transcript identifier for the canonical transcript

chromosome.description: Chromosome location of the canonical transcript

start.description: Genomic start position of the canonical transcript

end.description: Genomic end position of the canonical transcript

strand.description: Strand orientation of the canonical transcript

canonicalExons.description: List of canonical exons for the target gene

genomicLocation.description: Genomic location information of the target gene

chromosome.description: Chromosome on which the target located

start.description: Genomic start position of the target gene

end.description: Genomic end position of the target gene

strand.description: Strand orientation of the target gene

alternativeGenes.description: List of alternative Ensembl gene identifiers mapped to non-canonical chromosomes

approvedName.description: Approved full name of the target gene

go.description: List of Gene Ontology (GO) annotations related to the target

id.description: GO identifier for the annotation [bioregistry:go]

source.description: Source database and identifer where the ontology term was sourced from

aspect.description: Type of the GO annotation: molecular function (F), biological process (P) and cellular localisation (C)

geneProduct.description: Gene product associated with the GO annotation [bioregistry:uniprot]

ecoId.description: Evidence & Conclusion Ontology (ECO) identifier for the GO annotation [bioregistry:eco]

hallmarks.description: Hallmarks related to the target gene sourced from COSMIC

pmid.description: PubMed ID of the supporting literature for the hallmark attribute [bioregistry:pubmed]

cancerHallmarks.description: Cancer hallmarks associated with the target gene

impact.description: Impact of the cancer hallmark on the target

synonyms.description: List of synonyms for the target gene

label.description: Symbol synonym label for the target

nameSynonyms.description: List of name-based synonyms for the target gene

label.description: Name synonym label for the target

functionDescriptions.description: Functional descriptions of the target gene sourced from UniProt

subcellularLocations.description: List of subcellular locations where the target protein is found

location.description: Name of the subcellular compartment where the protein was found

source.description: Source database for the subcellular location

termSL.description: Subcellular location term identifier from SwissProt [bioregistry:sl]

id.description: Unique identifier for the target class

level.description: Hierarchical level of the target class

obsoleteNames.description: List of obsolete names previously used for the target gene

oeUpper.description: Upper bound of the OE constraint score

upperRank.description: Rank of the target gene in constraint analysis

upperBin.description: Binned category for the constraint score

upperBin6.description: Six-bin classification of the constraint score

proteinIds.description: Protein identifiers associated with the target

id.description: Protein ID for the target

source.description: Source database for the protein ID

id.description: Cross-reference ID for external databases

chemicalProbes.description: Chemical probes related to the target

control.description: Whether the chemical probe serves as a control

drugId.description: Drug ID associated with the chemical probe

id.description: Unique identifier for the chemical probe

isHighQuality.description: Indicates if the chemical probe is high quality

mechanismOfAction.description: Mechanism of action of the chemical probe

probeMinerScore.description: Score from ProbeMiner for chemical probe quality

probesDrugsScore.description: Score for chemical probes related to druggability

scoreInCells.description: Score indicating chemical probe activity in cells

scoreInOrganisms.description: Score indicating chemical probe activity in organisms

urls.description: URLs linking to more information about the chemical probe

niceName.description: Nice name for the linked URL

url.description: URL providing details about the chemical probe

homologues.description: Homologues of the target gene in other species

targetGeneId.description: Target gene ID of the homologue

isHighConfidence.description: Indicates if the homology is high confidence

targetGeneSymbol.description: Gene symbol of the homologous target

queryPercentageIdentity.description: Percentage identity of the query gene in the homologue

targetPercentageIdentity.description: Percentage identity of the homologue in the query gene

id.description: Unique identifier for the tractability category

value.description: Tractability value assigned to the target

safetyLiabilities.description: Safety liabilities associated with the target

event.description: Safety event associated with the target

eventId.description: Unique identifier for the safety event

effects.description: Effects reported for the safety event

direction.description: Direction of the reported effect (e.g., increase or decrease)

dosing.description: Dosing conditions related to the reported effect

datasource.description: Data source reporting the safety liability

literature.description: Literature references for the safety liability

url.description: URL linking to more details on safety liabilities

tss.description: Transcription Start Site (TSS) information for the target

id.description: Target identifier the essentiality was measured on [bioregistry:ensembl]

geneEssentiality.description: Essentiality measurements of the gene based on CRISPR screening data in different cellular models

depMapEssentiality.description: Essentiality measurements extraced from Depmap, stratified by tissue or anatomical units

screens.description: List of CRISPR screening experiments supporting the essentiality assessment

cellLineName.description: Name of the cancer cell line in which the gene essentiality was assessed

depmapId.description: Unique identifier of the assay in DepMap

diseaseCellLineId.description: Cell modell passport identifier of a celline modelling a disease

diseaseFromSource.description: Disease associated with the cell line as reported in the source data

expression.description: Gene expression level in the corresponding cell line

geneEffect.description: Gene effect score indicating the impact of gene knockout

mutation.description: Background mutation the tested cell line have

tissueId.description: Identifier of the tissue from where the cells were sample for assay [bioregistry:uberon]

tissueName.description: Name of the tissue from where the cells were sample for assay

isEssential.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the tested gene is considered essential in the given context

ancestryId.description: Identifier of the ancestry in the HANCESTRO ontology [bioregistry:hancestro]

betaConfidenceIntervalLower.description: Lower value of the confidence interval

betaConfidenceIntervalUpper.description: Upper value of the confidence interval

biologicalModelAllelicComposition.description: Allelic composition of the model organism

biologicalModelGeneticBackground.description: Genetic background of the model organism

biologicalModelId.description: Identifier of the biological model (eg. in MGI)

biomarkerName.description: Altered characteristics that influences the disease process

geneExpression.description: List of gene expression altering biomarkers

id.description: Gene Ontology (GO) identifiers of regulation or background expression processes [bioregistry:go]

name.description: Raw gene expression annotation from the source

geneticVariation.description: List of gene expression altering biomarkers

functionalConsequenceId.description: Functional consequene identifier of the variant biomarker [bioregistry:so]

id.description: Variant identifier

biosamplesFromSource.description: Identifier of the referenced biological material

cellType.description: The studied cell type. Preferably the cell line ontology label

clinicalSignificances.description: Standard terms to define clinical significance

clinicalStatus.description: Current stage of a clinical study

cohortPhenotypes.description: Clinical features/phenotypes observed in studied individuals

cohortShortName.description: Short name of the studied cohort

confidence.description: Confidence qualifier on the reported evidence

crisprScreenLibrary.description: The applied screening library in the CRISPR/CAS9 project

diseaseCellLines.description: Cancer cell lines used to generate evidence

id.description: Cell type identifier in cell ontology or in cell model database

tissue.description: Name of the tissue from which the cells were sampled

tissueId.description: Anatomical identifier of the sampled organ/tissue [bioregistry:uberon]

diseaseFromSource.description: Disease label from the original source

diseaseFromSourceId.description: Disease identifier from the original source

diseaseModelAssociatedHumanPhenotypes.description: Human phenotypes equivalent to those observed in animal models

id.description: Human phenotype ontology identifier [bioregistry:hp]

diseaseModelAssociatedModelPhenotypes.description: Phenotypes observed in genetically-modified animal models

id.description: Mouse phenotype ontology identifier [bioregistry:mp]

drugFromSource.description: Drug name/family in resource of origin

geneticBackground.description: Additional genetic background of the applied cell line in the CRISPR screen

literature.description: List of PubMed or preprint reference identifiers

log2FoldChangePercentileRank.description: Percentile of top differentially regulated genes (transcripts) within experiment

log2FoldChangeValue.description: Log2 fold expression change in contrast experiment

mutatedSamples.description: Samples with a given mutation tested

functionalConsequenceId.description: Functional consequene identifier of the pooled mutations [bioregistry:so]

numberMutatedSamples.description: Number of cohort samples in which target is mutated with a mutation of any type

numberSamplesWithMutationType.description: Number of cohort samples in which target is mutated with a specific mutation type

oddsRatio.description: Size of effect captured as odds ratio

oddsRatioConfidenceIntervalLower.description: Lower value of the confidence interval for odds ratio

oddsRatioConfidenceIntervalUpper.description: Upper value of the confidence interval for odds ratio

id.description: Reactome pathway identifier [bioregistry:reactome]

projectId.description: The identifer of the project that generated the data

reactionId.description: Pathway, gene set or reaction identifier in Reactome

reactionName.description: Name of the reaction, patway or gene set in Reactome

releaseDate.description: Date of the release of the data in a 'YYYY-MM-DD' format

resourceScore.description: Score provided by datasource indicating strength of target-disease association

sex.description: Sex of the samples/population included in the analysis

significantDriverMethods.description: Methods to detect cancer driver genes producing significant results

statisticalMethod.description: The statistical method used to calculate the association

statisticalMethodOverview.description: Overview of the statistical method used to calculate the association

statisticalTestTail.description: End of the distribution the target was picked from

studyCases.description: Number of cases in case-control study

studyCasesWithQualifyingVariants.description: Number of cases in case-control study that carry at least one allele of the qualifying variant

studyId.description: Identifier of the study generating the data

studyStartDate.description: Start date of study in a YYYY-MM-DD format

studyStopReason.description: Reason why a study has been stopped

studyStopReasonCategories.description: Predicted reason(s) why the study has been stopped based on studyStopReason

targetFromSource.description: Target name/synonym or non HGNC symbol in resource of origin

targetFromSourceId.description: Target ID in resource of origin (accepted sources include Ensembl gene ID, Uniprot ID, gene symbol), only capital letters are accepted

targetInModelEnsemblId.description: Target Ensembl ID in animal model [bioregistry:ensembl]

targetInModelMgiId.description: Target MGI ID in animal model [bioregistry:mgi]

urls.description: Reference to linked external resource (e.g. clinical trials, studies, package inserts, reports, etc.)

niceName.description: Human readable label of the remote reference

variantAminoacidDescriptions.description: Descriptions of variant consequences at protein level

variantFromSourceId.description: Identifier of the disease-causing variant at source

variantFunctionalConsequenceId.description: Sequence ontology (SO) identifier of the functional consequence of the variant [bioregistry:so]

variantHgvsId.description: Identifier in HGVS notation of the disease-causing variant

variantId.description: Identifier in CHROM_POS_REF_ALT notation of the disease-causing variant

pmcIds.description: List of PubMed Central identifiers of full text publication

studyLocusId.description: Identifier of the Open Targets Study Locus

textMiningSentences.description: Sentences of a publication supporting the disease/target relationship

dEnd.description: End position of the disease label in sentence

dStart.description: Start position of the disease label in the sentence

section.description: Section of the publication the sentence was extracted from

tEnd.description: End position of the target label in the sentence

tStart.description: Start position of the target label in the sentence

text.description: Text of the sentence with the disease/target relationship

id.description: Identifer of the disease/target evidence

score.description: Score of the evidence reflecting the strength of the disease/target relationship

variantEffect.description: Gain or loss of function annotation of the variant effect

directionOnTrait.description: Predicted direction of effect on the trait

id.description: Unique identifier for the Reactome pathway [bioregistry:reactome]

label.description: Name or label of the pathway

ancestors.description: List of ancestor pathways in the ontology

descendants.description: List of descendant pathways in the ontology

children.description: Direct child pathways of the current pathway

parents.description: Direct parent pathways of the current pathway

path.description: Hierarchical path representing the position of the pathway in Reactome

id.description: Gene ontology term identifier [bioregistry:go]

targetId.description: Unique identifier for the target, typically an Ensembl gene ID.

isInMembrane.description: Indicates if the target protein is located in the cell or plasma membrane.

isSecreted.description: Indicates if the target protein is secreted or predicted to be secreted.

hasSafetyEvent.description: Indicates if there are known safety events associated with the target.

hasPocket.description: Indicates if the target has predicted binding pockets suitable for small molecule binding.

hasLigand.description: Indicates if the target binds at least one high-quality ligand.

hasSmallMoleculeBinder.description: Indicates if the target has at least one small molecule binder.

geneticConstraint.description: Represents the genetic constraint of the target, indicating how intolerant it is to genetic variation.

paralogMaxIdentityPercentage.description: Maximum percentage identity among the target's paralogous genes.

mouseOrthologMaxIdentityPercentage.description: Maximum percentage identity between the target and its mouse ortholog.

isCancerDriverGene.description: Indicates if the target is identified as a cancer driver gene.

hasTEP.description: Indicates if a Target Enabling Package (TEP) is available for the target.

mouseKOScore.description: Represents the phenotypic score from mouse knockout models for the target.

hasHighQualityChemicalProbes.description: Indicates if there are high-quality chemical probes available for the target.

maxClinicalTrialPhase.description: Highest clinical trial phase that the target has reached for any indication.

tissueSpecificity.description: Describes the specificity of the target's expression across different tissues.

tissueDistribution.description: Describes the distribution pattern of the target's expression in various tissues.

variantId.description: The unique identifier for the variant following schema: {chromosome}-{position}-{referenceAllele}-{alternateAllele}

chromosome.description: The chromosome on which the variant is located

position.description: The position on the chromosome of the variant

referenceAllele.description: The reference allele for the variant

alternateAllele.description: The alternate allele for the variant

variantEffect.description: List predicted or measured effect of the variant based on various methods

method.description: The method name used to predict the effect of the variant

assessment.description: Textual assessment of the variant effect

score.description: The score of the variant effect

assessmentFlag.description: Flagging if the variant effect is considered pathogenic

targetId.description: The target identifier on which the variant effect is interpreted [bioregistry:ensembl]

mostSevereConsequenceId.description: The sequence ontology identifier of the most severe consequence of the variant based on Ensembl VEP [bioregistry:so]

variantFunctionalConsequenceIds.description: The sequence ontology identifier of the consequence of the variant based on Ensembl VEP in the context of the transcript [bioregistry:so]

aminoAcidChange.description: The amino acide change caused by this variant on this gene

uniprotAccessions.description: List of Uniprot identifiers of the gene product [bioregistry:uniprot]

isEnsemblCanonical.description: Flagging if the transcript is the canonical transcript for the gene

codons.description: The affected codon in the transcript

distanceFromFootprint.description: The distance of the variant from the transcript

distanceFromTss.description: The distance of the variant from the transcription start site

appris.description: The appris annotation of the transcript

targetId.description: Open Target target identifier of the transcript [bioregistry:ensembl]

impact.description: Ensembl VEP predicted impact of the variant on the transcript

lofteePrediction.description: Loss of function prediction based on LOFTEE

siftPrediction.description: SIFT prediction of the variant impact on the transcript

polyphenPrediction.description: Polyphen prediction of the variant impact on the transcript

consequenceScore.description: Score assigned to transcript based on Ensembl VEP consequence

transcriptIndex.description: The index of the transcript in the list of transcripts around the gene

approvedSymbol.description: The HGNC gene symbol of the gene

rsIds.description: The list of rsIds for the variant

alleleFrequencies.description: The allele frequencies of the variant in different populations

alleleFrequency.description: The frequency of the alternate allele in the population

dbXrefs.description: The list of cross-references for the variant in different databases

id.description: Identifier of the variant in the given database

source.description: Name of the database the variant is referenced in

variantDescription.description: Short summary of the variant effect
